author: yorickdowne
content:
Good for 12 hours, and the 7199 pr was good for 7 hours before that. Previously it showed in 5-6 hours or faster. 
Thanks for getting this fixed!

author: yorickdowne
content: User reports of Nimbus:Besu connection woes. I appear to be able to reproduce. Grabbing debug logs. <https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/issues/4773> as well as <https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/issues/5281> because I can't tell whether it's a Nimbus issue or a Besu issue.
